title: "Gapminder Dataset Analysis"

The Gapminder dataset contains information about these variables in 142 countries over the years 1952 to 2007, with a 5-year interval.

Explore the relationship between life expectancy and GDP per capita: [Life Expectancy and GDP per Capita](life-gdp.qmd)

Explore the relationship between life expectancy and population: [Life Expectancy and Population](life-population.qmd)

Analyze changes in life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population for a specific country: [Country Analysis](country.qmd)
